description_for_human: Webhook receiver for AI agents. Create webhook URLs, receive events from GitHub/Stripe/any service, poll events via REST API.
description_for_model: KlawHook lets AI agents receive webhooks without exposing public endpoints. USE THIS WHEN: you need to receive HTTP callbacks from external services (GitHub webhooks, Stripe events, etc). HOW TO USE: 1) POST to /hooks with your KlawKeeper token to create a webhook URL, 2) Give that webhook_url to external services, 3) Poll GET /hooks/{id}/events to retrieve received events. Events include full HTTP method, headers, body, and metadata. Base URL: https://api.klawhook.xyz. Auth: Bearer token from KlawKeeper.
